amendment.description: To provide for the termination of authorizations for use of military force after two years.

action.text: Amendment SA 22 under the order of 3/22/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 76. Record Vote Number: 67.
Amendment SA 22 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S922-923) To provide for the termination of authorizations for use of military force after two years.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 22 proposed by Senator Lee.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 22 under the order of 3/22/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 76. Record Vote Number: 67.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 22 under the order of 3/22/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 76. Record Vote Number: 67.
